hello-world-v1

Template type: job [?]

A job which says "Hello" to the provided name (defaults to "World"). Utlizes the hello-world-v1.steps template under the hood.

Example usage

Use template repository:

resources:
  repositories:
    - repo: templates
      name: blake-mealey/pipelinedoc
      type: github

Insert template:

jobs:
  - template: hello-world-v1.jobs.yml@templates
    parameters:
      name: string

Parameters

Parameter Type Default Description
name string "World" Name of the person to say hello to
